meanings.definition: A parasitic plant lacking chlorophyll and leaves, living on the roots, stems, or leaves of other plants.
meanings.sent1: The funguses on the tree roots were draining the nutrients.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners need to be careful of funguses that harm plants.
meanings.sent3: The funguses seemed to be having a party on the plant roots.
meanings.sent4: The funguses spread like a shadow over the garden.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the funguses made them stand out.

meanings.definition: Any of a diverse group of eukaryotic single-celled or multinucleate organisms that live by decomposing and absorbing the organic material in which they grow.
meanings.sent1: In the forest, funguses play a crucial role in breaking down dead trees.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study different types of funguses to understand their impact on ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The funguses in the compost bin were having a feast.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jungle of thoughts, each one a different type of funguses.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the funguses in the forest was earthy and rich.
